name: dotgne
description: A simple, secure private photo sharing system

AWS_BUCKET.description: The name of your S3 bucket - not the path, just the name

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: AWS access key for a user with read write permissions on your bucket

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: The secret key for your AWS user

BASE_URL.description: The URL at which your app is running, with trailing slash. For example, https://appname.herokuapp.com/

IMGIXSOURCE.description: The name of your Imgix source

IMGIXSIGN.description: The security token for your Imgix source
